title: 'It's a gamble': England's 'big bang' easing of Covid rules could go either way, experts note
content:
1. 'It's a gamble': England's 'big bang' easing of Covid rules could go either way, experts note  CNBC
  2. 'Freedom Day': Boris and Rishi Sunak back in coronavirus quarantine  The Washington Post
  3. Is Boris Johnson’s ‘levelling up’ rhetoric fooling anyone?  The Guardian
  4. Attempt to wiggle free from Covid self-isolation ends in warp-speed U-turn as BoJo and Rishi Sunak realise just how bad this looks  RT
  5. From Boris Johnson’s self-isolation U-turn to Barnard Castle, our leaders have treated us with contempt  iNews
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
